alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 12:34AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Saline County through 115 AM CDT... At 1234 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Smolan, or 8 miles south of Salina, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, Assaria, Gypsum, Smolan, New Cambria, Bridgeport, Salina Airport and Kipp. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 77 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 250 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
